CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(amc__Milestone__r.amc__Project__r.amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price"), ISPICKVAL(amc__Milestone__r.amc__Project__r.amc__Billing_Type__c, 'Fixed Price + Expenses') ), (amc__Hours_Scheduled_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c) - (amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Completed_Cost__c), (amc__Hours_Completed_Cost__c + amc__Expense_Summary__c ) - (amc__Hours_Completed_Value_Cost__c + amc__Material_Costs_Completed_Cost__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the P&L for the Action based on the Actual figures. If Fixed Price used Scheduled Billable Value otherwise use Completed Billable Value and minus Hours Completed Value Cost
CustomField.label: P&L (Actual)
